amendment.description: An amendment printed in H.Rept. 106-284 to prohibit the expenditure of any appropriation to denigrate or otherwise undermine the religious or moral beliefs of students who participate in programs funded by the Act.

action.text: Tiahrt amendment (A016) modified by unanimous consent. The prohibition is limited to funds made available to the Department of Justice.
On agreeing to the Tiahrt amendment (A016) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
